Class DaySchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DaySchedule

  • public class DaySchedule
extends Object
    A class representing the day with the tasks that have to be made in that day.
    Version:
    2.1 - 15/12/2018
    Author:
    Radu Candea
